message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of the situation.  This is a fair compromise.
Come on, Alice. I'm starting to lose value here. Meet me in the middle... of my side.
Bob, I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with this back and forth. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of the inflation. This is my final offer.
